00083         assert(str);

00097 class SentenceToAnalyzerBuffer
00098 {
00099 public:
00105     SentenceToAnalyzerBuffer(jma::JMA_Analyzer& analyzer, string& buf)
00106         :analyzer_(analyzer), buffer_(buf) {}
00107 
00112     void process(const char* str) {
00113         assert(str);
00114 
00115         jma::Sentence sentence(str);
00116         analyzer_.runOneBest(sentence);
00117 
00118         // get result only if it exists
00119         if(sentence.getListSize()) {
00120             assert(sentence.getListSize() == 1 && "one best analyze should contain only one result");
00121 
00122             int index = 0;
00123             bool isPOS = analyzer_.isOutputPOS();
00124             const char* posDelim = analyzer_.getPOSDelimiter();
00125             const char* wordDelim = analyzer_.getWordDelimiter();
00126 
00127             for(int j=0; j<sentence.getCount(index); ++j) {
00128                 buffer_ += sentence.getLexicon(index, j);
00129                 if(isPOS) {
00130                     buffer_ += posDelim;
00131                     buffer_ += sentence.getStrPOS(index, j);
00132                 }
00133                 buffer_ += wordDelim;
00134             }
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138 private:
00140     jma::JMA_Analyzer& analyzer_;
00141 
00143     string& buffer_;
00144 };
00145 
00146 }

00150 
00158 inline bool isSameMorphemeList( const MorphemeList* list1, const MorphemeList* list2, bool printPOS )
00159 {
00160     // if one is zero pointer, return null
00161     if( !list1 || !list2 )
00162     {
00163         return false;
00164     }
00165 
00166     if( list1->size() != list2->size() )
00167         return false;
00168     //compare one by one
00169     size_t N = list1->size();
00170     if( printPOS )
00171     {
00172         for( size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i )
00173         {
00174             const Morpheme& m1 = (*list1)[i];
00175             const Morpheme& m2 = (*list2)[i];
00176             if( m1.lexicon_ != m2.lexicon_ || m1.posCode_ != m2.posCode_
00177                     || m1.posStr_ != m2.posStr_ )
00178             {
00179                 return false;
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183     else
00184     {
00185         for( size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i )
00186         {
00187             if( (*list1)[i].lexicon_ != (*list2)[i].lexicon_ )
00188                 return false;
00189         }
00190     }
00191     //all the elements are the same
00192     return true;
00193 }

00232 POSTable::POSFormat JMA_Analyzer::getPOSFormat() const
00233 {
00234     POSTable::POSFormat type = POSTable::POS_FORMAT_DEFAULT;
00235 
00236     if(getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET) != 0)
00237     {
00238         type = POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET;
00239     }
00240     else if(getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY) != 0)
00241     {
00242         type = POSTable::POS_FORMAT_FULL_CATEGORY;
00243     }
00244 
00245     return type;

00248 int JMA_Analyzer::setKnowledge(Knowledge* pKnowledge)
00249 {
00250     assert(pKnowledge);
00251 
00252     // release the resources before allocating new ones
00253     clear();
00254 
00255     knowledge_ = dynamic_cast<JMA_Knowledge*>(pKnowledge);
00256     assert(knowledge_);
00257 
00258     tagger_ = knowledge_->createTagger();
00259     if(tagger_ == NULL)
00260     {
00261         cerr << "error: fail to create tagger, please insure that Knowledge::loadDict() returns 1 before this function is called." << endl;
00262         return 0;
00263     }
00264     tagger_->set_lattice_level(1);
00265     if(knowledge_->getCType() == NULL)
00266     {
00267         cerr << "error: fail to get character type, please insure that Knowledge::loadDict() returns 1 before this function is called." << endl;
00268         return 0;
00269     }
00270 
00271     posTable_ = &knowledge_->getPOSTable();
00272     kanaTable_ = &knowledge_->getKanaTable();
00273     widthTable_ = &knowledge_->getWidthTable();
00274     caseTable_ = &knowledge_->getCaseTable();
00275     decompMap_ = &knowledge_->getDecompMap();
00276 
00277     return 1;
00278 }
00279 
00280 int JMA_Analyzer::runWithSentence(Sentence& sentence)
00281 {
00282     assert(knowledge_ && knowledge_->getCType() && tagger_);
00283 
00284     int N = static_cast<int>(getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST));
00285     assert(N > 0 && "the nbest option should be positive");
00286 
00287     if(N == 1)
00288     {
00289         runOneBest(sentence);
00290     }
00291     else
00292     {
00293         if(! runNBest(sentence, N))
00294             return 0;
00295     }
00296 
00297     return 1;
00298 }

00300 const char* JMA_Analyzer::runWithString(const char* inStr)
00301 {
00302     assert(knowledge_ && knowledge_->getCType() && tagger_);
00303     assert(inStr);
00304 
00305     strBuf_.clear();
00306     SentenceToAnalyzerBuffer processor(*this, strBuf_);
00307     iterateSentence(inStr, processor);
00308 
00309     return strBuf_.c_str();
00310 }

00312 int JMA_Analyzer::runWithStream(const char* inFileName, const char* outFileName)
00313 {
00314     assert(knowledge_ && knowledge_->getCType() && tagger_);
00315     assert(inFileName);
00316     assert(outFileName);
00317 
00318     ifstream in(inFileName);
00319     if(!in)
00320     {
00321         cerr<<"[Error] The input file "<<inFileName<<" not exists!"<<endl;
00322         return 0;
00323     }
00324 
00325     ofstream out(outFileName);
00326     if(!out)
00327     {
00328         cerr<<"[Error] The output file "<<outFileName<<" could not be created!"<<endl;
00329         return 0;
00330     }
00331 
00332     string line;
00333     while(getline(in, line))
00334         out << runWithString(line.c_str()) << endl;
00335 
00336     return 1;
00337 }

00339 void JMA_Analyzer::splitSentence(const char* paragraph, std::vector<Sentence>& sentences)
00340 {
00341     assert(knowledge_ && knowledge_->getCType());
00342     assert(paragraph);
00343 
00344     SentenceToList processor(sentences);
00345     iterateSentence(paragraph, processor);

00347 
00348 void JMA_Analyzer::getFeatureStr(const char* featureList, int featureOffset, std::string& retVal) const
00349 {
00350     assert(featureList && featureOffset >= 0);
00351     
00352     const char delimit = ',';
00353     const char* str = featureList;
00354     const char* stre = featureList + strlen(featureList);
00355     const char* begin = 0;
00356     const char* end = 0;
00357 
00358     const int size = featureOffset + 1; // how many ',' to find
00359     int count = 0; // how many ',' have been found
00360 
00361     while(count < size && str < stre)
00362     {
00363         begin = str;
00364         end = find(str, stre, delimit);
00365         ++count; // also when 'end' reaches 'stre'
00366 
00367         if(end == stre)
00368             break;
00369 
00370         str = end + 1;
00371     }
00372 
00373     if(count == size)
00374     {
00375         retVal = string(begin, end - begin);
00376         if(retVal == "*")
00377             retVal = "";
00378     }
00379     else
00380         retVal = "";
00381 }
00382 
00383 Morpheme JMA_Analyzer::getMorpheme(const MeCab::Node* node) const
00384 {
00385     assert(node);
00386 
00387     Morpheme result;
00388 
00389     result.lexicon_.assign(node->surface, node->length);
00390 
00391     getFeatureStr(node->feature, knowledge_->getBaseFormOffset(), result.baseForm_);
00392     if(result.baseForm_.empty())
00393         result.baseForm_ = result.lexicon_;
00394 
00395     getFeatureStr(node->feature, knowledge_->getReadFormOffset(), result.readForm_);
00396 
00397     getFeatureStr(node->feature, knowledge_->getNormFormOffset(), result.normForm_);
00398     if(result.normForm_.empty())
00399         result.normForm_ = result.lexicon_;
00400 
00401     result.posCode_ = (int)node->posid;
00402     result.posStr_ = posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, getPOSFormat());
00403 
00404     return result;
00405 }
00406 
00407 MeCab::Node* JMA_Analyzer::combineNode(MeCab::Node* startNode, Morpheme& result) const
00408 {
00409     assert(startNode && startNode->next && "it is invalid to combine NULL or EOS node");
00410 
00411     result = getMorpheme(startNode);
00412 
00413     // check option
00414     if(! isCombineCompound())
00415         return startNode;
00416 
00417     MeCab::Node* node = startNode;
00418     int startPOS = (int)node->posid;
00419     while(node->next)
00420     {
00421         const RuleNode* ruleNode = posTable_->getCombineRule(startPOS, node->next);
00422         if(! ruleNode)
00423             break;
00424 
00425 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00426         cerr << result.lexicon_ << "/" << result.posStr_;
00427 #endif
00428 
00429         // start from next node
00430         for(int i=1; i<ruleNode->level_; ++i)
00431         {
00432             node = node->next;
00433             assert(node->next && "the node should not be end-of-sentence node.");
00434 
00435             Morpheme morp = getMorpheme(node);
00436 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00437             cerr << "\t+\t" << morp.lexicon_ << "/" << morp.posStr_;
00438 #endif
00439             result.baseForm_ = result.lexicon_ + morp.baseForm_; // combined base form = previous lexicon + last base form
00440             result.lexicon_ += morp.lexicon_;
00441             result.readForm_ += morp.readForm_;
00442             result.normForm_ += morp.normForm_;
00443         }
00444 
00445         result.posCode_ = ruleNode->target_;
00446         result.posStr_ = posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, getPOSFormat());
00447         startPOS = result.posCode_; // to match rules from this combined result
00448 
00449 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00450         cerr << "\t=>\t" << result.lexicon_ << "/" << result.posStr_ << endl;
00451 #endif
00452     }
00453 
00454     return node;
00455 }
00456 
00457 template<class MorphemeProcessor>
00458 void JMA_Analyzer::iterateNode(const MeCab::Node* bosNode, MorphemeProcessor& processor) const
00459 {
00460     Morpheme morp;
00461     bool isDecompose = isDecomposeUserNound();
00462     JMA_Knowledge::DecompMap::const_iterator iter;
00463     for(MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next; node=node->next)
00464     {
00465         node = combineNode(node, morp);
00466 
00467         if(isDecompose
00468                 && morp.posCode_ == knowledge_->getUserNounPOSIndex()
00469                 && (iter = decompMap_->find(morp.lexicon_)) != decompMap_->end())
00470         {
00471             // decompose into morpheme list
00472             const MorphemeList& morphList = iter->second;
00473             for(MorphemeList::const_iterator miter = morphList.begin(); miter!=morphList.end(); ++miter)
00474             {
00475                 if(isFilter(*miter))
00476                     continue;
00477 
00478                 Morpheme decomp(*miter);
00479                 decomp.baseForm_ = decomp.normForm_ = decomp.lexicon_; // no variant for user noun
00480                 decomp.posCode_ = morp.posCode_; // index of POS user noun
00481                 decomp.posStr_ = morp.posStr_; // string of POS user noun
00482                 processor.process(decomp);
00483             }
00484         }
00485         else
00486         {
00487             if(isFilter(morp))
00488                 continue;
00489 
00490             processor.process(morp);
00491         }
00492     }
00493 }
00494 
00495 std::string JMA_Analyzer::convertCharacters(const char* str) const
00496 {
00497     assert(knowledge_ && knowledge_->getCType());
00498     assert(str);
00499 
00500     string result;
00501     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00502     tokenizer.assign(str);
00503 
00504     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00505     {
00506         const char* q;
00507         if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA) != 0)
00508         {
00509             if((q = kanaTable_->toLeft(p)) != NULL)
00510                 p = q;
00511         }
00512         if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA) != 0)
00513         {
00514             if((q = kanaTable_->toRight(p)) != NULL)
00515                 p = q;
00516         }
00517         if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HALF_WIDTH) != 0)
00518         {
00519             if((q = widthTable_->toLeft(p)) != NULL)
00520                 p = q;
00521         }
00522         if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_FULL_WIDTH) != 0)
00523         {
00524             if((q = widthTable_->toRight(p)) != NULL)
00525                 p = q;
00526         }
00527         if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_LOWER_CASE) != 0)
00528         {
00529             if((q = caseTable_->toLeft(p)) != NULL)
00530                 p = q;
00531         }
00532         if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_UPPER_CASE) != 0)
00533         {
00534             if((q = caseTable_->toRight(p)) != NULL)
00535                 p = q;
00536         }
00537 
00538         result += p;
00539     }
00540 
00541     return result;
00542 }
00543 
00544 bool JMA_Analyzer::isFilter(const Morpheme& morph) const
00545 {
00546     if(knowledge_->isStopWord(morph.lexicon_) || ! knowledge_->isKeywordPOS(morph.posCode_))
00547         return true;
00548 
00549     return false;
00550 }
00551 
00552 template<class SentenceProcessor>
00553 void JMA_Analyzer::iterateSentence(const char* paragraph, SentenceProcessor& processor)
00554 {
00555     assert(paragraph);
00556 
00557     string sentenceStr;
00558     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00559     tokenizer.assign(paragraph);
00560 
00561     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00562     {
00563         sentenceStr += p;
00564 
00565         if(knowledge_->isSentenceSeparator(p))
00566         {
00567             processor.process(sentenceStr.c_str());
00568             sentenceStr.clear();
00569         }
00570     }
00571 
00572     // in case the last character is not sentence separator
00573     if(! sentenceStr.empty())
00574     {
00575         processor.process(sentenceStr.c_str());
00576         sentenceStr.clear();
00577     }
00578 }
00579 
00580 void JMA_Analyzer::splitLimitSize(const char* str, std::vector<std::string>& limitStrVec, unsigned int limitSize) const
00581 {
00582     string limitStr;
00583     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00584     tokenizer.assign(str);
00585     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00586     {
00587         // white-space characters are removed
00588         if(knowledge_->getCType()->isSpace(p))
00589         {
00590             continue;
00591         }
00592         else if(limitStr.length() + strlen(p) >= limitSize)
00593         {
00594             limitStrVec.push_back(limitStr);
00595             limitStr.clear();
00596         }
00597 
00598         limitStr += p;
00599     }
00600 
00601     // the rest characters
00602     if(! limitStr.empty())
00603     {
00604         limitStrVec.push_back(limitStr);
00605         limitStr.clear();
00606     }
00607 
00608     assert(validateSplitLimitResult(str, limitStrVec, limitSize));
00609 }
00610 
00611 bool JMA_Analyzer::validateSplitLimitResult(const char* str, const std::vector<std::string>& limitStrVec, unsigned int limitSize) const
00612 {
00613     // remove white-space characters in original string
00614     string originStr;
00615     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00616     tokenizer.assign(str);
00617     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00618     {
00619         // white-space characters are removed
00620         if(knowledge_->getCType()->isSpace(p))
00621         {
00622             continue;
00623         }
00624 
00625         originStr += p;
00626     }
00627 
00628     string combineStr;
00629     for(unsigned int i=0; i<limitStrVec.size(); ++i)
00630     {
00631         combineStr += limitStrVec[i];
00632         // all the splitted string size should be less than limitSize
00633         if(limitStrVec[i].length() >= limitSize)
00634         {
00635             cerr << "failed in JMA_Analyzer::validateSplitLimitResult()" << endl;
00636             cerr << "expect less than length: " << limitSize << endl;
00637             cerr << "actual length: " << limitStrVec[i].length() << endl;
00638             cerr << "split index: " << i << endl;
00639             cerr << "split string: " << limitStrVec[i] << endl << endl;
00640             return false;
00641         }
00642     }
00643 
00644     if(combineStr != originStr)
00645     {
00646         cerr << "failed in JMA_Analyzer::validateSplitLimitResult()" << endl;
00647         cerr << "original string (no white-space): " << originStr << endl;
00648         cerr << "combination result: " << combineStr << endl;
00649         return false;
00650     }
00651 
00652     return true;
00653 }
00654 
00655 void JMA_Analyzer::runOneBest(Sentence& sentence) const
00656 {
00657     vector<string> limitStrVec;
00658     splitLimitSize(sentence.getString(), limitStrVec, LIMIT_PARSE_LENGTH);
00659 
00660     MorphemeList list;
00661     MorphemeToList processor(list);
00662 
00663     for(vector<string>::const_iterator it=limitStrVec.begin(); it!=limitStrVec.end(); ++it)
00664     {
00665         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode(it->c_str());
00666         iterateNode(bosNode, processor);
00667     }
00668 
00669     // ignore empty result
00670     if(! list.empty())
00671         sentence.addList(list, 1.0);
00672 
00673     assert(validateSentenceResult(sentence));
00674 }
00675 
00676 bool JMA_Analyzer::runNBest(Sentence& sentence, int nbest) const
00677 {
00678     assert(nbest > 1);
00679 
00680     vector<string> limitStrVec;
00681     splitLimitSize(sentence.getString(), limitStrVec, LIMIT_PARSE_LENGTH);
00682 
00683     bool isPOS = isOutputPOS();
00684     const int maxCount = nbest * NBEST_LIMIT_SCALE_FACTOR;
00685 
00686     // nbest result for whole input
00687     vector<MorphemeList> totalNBestVec;
00688     vector<double> totalScoreVec;
00689 
00690     for(vector<string>::const_iterator it=limitStrVec.begin(); it!=limitStrVec.end(); ++it)
00691     {
00692         if(!tagger_->parseNBestInit(it->c_str()))
00693         {
00694             cerr << "error: fail to init nbest analyze on string: " << *it << endl;
00695             return false;
00696         }
00697 
00698         // nbest result for each buffer
00699         vector<MorphemeList> limitNBestVec;
00700         vector<double> limitScoreVec;
00701         long base = 0;
00702         // j to count steps to avoid iterating forever
00703         for (int j=0; limitNBestVec.size()<static_cast<unsigned int>(nbest) && j<maxCount; ++j)
00704         {
00705             const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->nextNode();
00706             if( !bosNode )
00707                 break;
00708 
00709             MorphemeList list;
00710             MorphemeToList processor(list);
00711             iterateNode(bosNode, processor);
00712 
00713             // ignore empty result
00714             if(list.empty())
00715                 continue;
00716 
00717             bool isDupl = false;
00718             // check the current result with previous results
00719             for(vector<MorphemeList>::const_reverse_iterator rit=limitNBestVec.rbegin(); rit<limitNBestVec.rend(); ++rit)
00720             {
00721                 if(isSameMorphemeList(&*rit, &list, isPOS))
00722                 {
00723                     isDupl = true;
00724                     break;
00725                 }
00726             }
00727             // ignore the duplicate results
00728             if(isDupl)
00729                 continue;
00730 
00731             long score = tagger_->nextScore();
00732             if(limitNBestVec.empty())
00733             {
00734                 if(score > 0 )
00735                     base = score > BASE_NBEST_SCORE ? score - BASE_NBEST_SCORE : 0;
00736                 else
00737                     base = score - BASE_NBEST_SCORE;
00738             }
00739 
00740             double dScore = 1.0 / (score - base );
00741             limitNBestVec.push_back(MorphemeList());
00742             limitNBestVec.back().swap(list);
00743             limitScoreVec.push_back(dScore);
00744         }
00745         assert(limitNBestVec.size() && "the nbest limit results should not be empty");
00746         assert(limitNBestVec.size() == limitScoreVec.size() && "the size of nbest and score limit results should be equal");
00747 
00748         // concatenate buffer result to whole result
00749         if(totalNBestVec.empty())
00750         {
00751             totalNBestVec.swap(limitNBestVec);
00752             totalScoreVec.swap(limitScoreVec);
00753         }
00754         else
00755         {
00756             const unsigned int totalSize = totalNBestVec.size();
00757             const unsigned int limitSize = limitNBestVec.size();
00758 
00759             // append 1st candidate until total size and limit size are equal
00760             if(totalSize < limitSize)
00761             {
00762                 totalNBestVec.insert(totalNBestVec.end(), limitSize-totalSize, totalNBestVec.front());
00763                 totalScoreVec.insert(totalScoreVec.end(), limitSize-totalSize, totalScoreVec.front());
00764             }
00765             else if(limitSize < totalSize)
00766             {
00767                 limitNBestVec.insert(limitNBestVec.end(), totalSize-limitSize, limitNBestVec.front());
00768                 limitScoreVec.insert(limitScoreVec.end(), totalSize-limitSize, limitScoreVec.front());
00769             }
00770 
00771             // concatenate limit to total
00772             const unsigned int newTotalSize = totalNBestVec.size();
00773             assert(limitNBestVec.size() == newTotalSize && totalScoreVec.size() == newTotalSize
00774                     && limitScoreVec.size() == newTotalSize && "the size of total and limit nbest results should be equal");
00775             for(unsigned int i=0; i<newTotalSize; ++i)
00776             {
00777                 totalNBestVec[i].insert(totalNBestVec[i].end(), limitNBestVec[i].begin(), limitNBestVec[i].end());
00778                 totalScoreVec[i] += limitScoreVec[i];
00779             }
00780         }
00781     }
00782     assert(totalNBestVec.size() == totalScoreVec.size() && "the size of nbest and score total results should be equal");
00783 
00784     double totalScore = 0;
00785     for(unsigned int i=0; i<totalScoreVec.size(); ++i)
00786         totalScore += totalScoreVec[i];
00787     // normalize denominator
00788     if(totalScore == 0)
00789         totalScore = 1;
00790 
00791     for(unsigned int i=0; i<totalNBestVec.size(); ++i)
00792         sentence.addList(totalNBestVec[i], totalScoreVec[i]/totalScore);
00793 
00794     assert(validateSentenceResult(sentence));
00795 
00796     return true;
00797 }
00798 
00799 bool JMA_Analyzer::validateSentenceResult(const Sentence& sentence) const
00800 {
00801     // when stop word is loaded or keyword POS is set,
00802     // this validation does not work, it simply does no check
00803     if(knowledge_->stopWordCount() || knowledge_->keywordPOSCount())
00804         return true;
00805 
00806     // remove white-space characters in original sentence
00807     string sentStr;
00808     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00809     tokenizer.assign(sentence.getString());
00810     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00811     {
00812         // white-space characters are removed
00813         if(knowledge_->getCType()->isSpace(p))
00814         {
00815             continue;
00816         }
00817 
00818         sentStr += p;
00819     }
00820 
00821     // each candidate
00822     for(int i=0; i<sentence.getListSize(); ++i)
00823     {
00824         string combineStr;
00825         for(int j=0; j<sentence.getCount(i); ++j)
00826         {
00827             combineStr += sentence.getLexicon(i, j);
00828         }
00829 
00830         if(combineStr != sentStr)
00831         {
00832             cerr << "failed in JMA_Analyzer::validateSentenceResult()" << endl;
00833             cerr << "sentence (no white-space): " << sentStr << endl;
00834             cerr << "combination result: " << combineStr << endl;
00835             return false;
00836         }
00837     }
00838 
00839     return true;
00840 }
00841 
00842 } // namespace jma
Generated on Tue Sep 21 18:34:45 2010 for Japanese Morphological Analyzer by  1.6.1
